name: Eternal Card Game
description: Six-guns and sorcery collide in Eternal, the new strategy card game of unlimited choices and unbelievable fun. Eternal brings AAA pace and polish to the infinite possibilities of a deep strategy card game. The only limits are your own creativity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 or OpenGL 3.x capabilities Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 or OpenGL 3.x capabilities Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
